title: Please Reset MMR FFS RITO
body: I don't play ranked. 0 lp B5. I won 6 out of 10 games this year and got fucking 40lp B5. Played this game for 4 years and really didn't give a fuck about ranked the first two. Now I try to get better (my friends play ranked and say I am a bronzie) and I get this fucking shit. Seriously my MMR is fucking shite and I ain't gonna grind 500 games of ranked to improve it.

replies.body:
make a new account friend.

They cut the xp needed to reach 30 in half so it only takes a few weeks to get to level 30.

I understand the champs/runes etc are on your main but when you get this new account to 30, play ranked and show your mates that its "because you ruined your MMR by being a nob".

^ This. Once you get used to playing at a higher level of play, it should be easy to get your main out from B5. 

> [Part of the problem is, you've played so many games where you are, that even if “you are better than everyone else where you are”, you have no means to improve. By far the fastest way to improve is to play with/against and then catch up to people of greater skill than you. If you are already top rung where you are, then you aren't going to be able to climb the metaphorical ladder of improvement, you need to find a taller ladder.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/uuXKhEmk-ok-legit-im-pissed-off-again?comment=0002000000000000000000000000000000000000)

^ Hasn't worked for me. Besides, that's fine when you're used to that level but what about you're team. Easily more than half the games I lose are because my team mates can't keep up with anything above bronze level.

Then you develop strategies to deal with your teams. How can you help them succeed? If you aren't good at this type of thinking, just play 5man dynamic queue with people you can trust. 

Either way you look at it, you have options to climb and better yourself.

>just play 5man dynamic queue with people you can trust.

I love how everyone is able to suggest this, but riot still tells us that it has no impact on actually climbing, number 1 suggestion to climb this season is just 5 man it.

Wel, if the guy is blaming his teams for not being able to climb he should probably control this variable and hand pick his teams :) It if truly is the teams he gets stuck with, he should be able to climb.

HAHAHAAHAHAHAH lol Feelsbadman, just play flavour of the month champs, Vlad, Panth, Ashe, Malz, Sona. I mean you are B5 and playing your main sure as hell isn't going to get you anywhere. Or just abuse the system and go dynamic =L Seems to work for everyone. Also why did you play ranked if you weren't ready. That's like having sex at the age of 18 just because you can or just because you are old enough to. Patience is the key to victory :). Unless you are playing an early game champ then...you're fucked...GG
